If an intervention is applied at time \\( t_1 \\), where a scaling factor \\( \\alpha \\) (a nonzero complex constant) modifies \\( z(t) \\) to \\( \\alpha z(t) \\), will the transformed endpoint \\( F(z(T)) \\) be independent of the initial condition \\( z_0 \\) given that the intervention \\( \\alpha \\) is known?
